title: 1.)TRUTH Tribe or 2.) LIE Tribe
body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"There are two tribes in Mars, Lie tribe and Truth Tribe."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Lie tribe always speaks lie, True tribe always speaks truth."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"You meet three mars people and ask"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"From First Person: What tribe you belong to?, he replies something in his language which you don’t understand."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Second person tells that he is saying that he belongs to Lie Tribe."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Third person says that second person is lying."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"What tribe does the third person belong to?"}]}]}

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Now assume that first person is from Lie tribe, then also he will say that i belong to truth tribe(as he is a lier), so second person is lying again in this case as well."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Thus third person is correct in both the scenarios, hence he belongs to Truth Tribe."}]},{"type":"text","text":"
